name: Oceanic Mimic: Frog
description:
When your active character receives DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.
Usage(s): 2. This card will not be discarded when the Usage(s) are depleted.
At the End Phase, if Usage(s) have been depleted: Discard this card and deal 2 Hydro DMG.
